entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A temp file + 2 folders are left behind in %TEMP% after each dotnet build command #35353
  • .net TLS 1.2 enable Ed25519 in signature algorithms extension #35345
  • Specifying a framework for multi-targeted dependencies that include a .NET Framework target does not work. #35341

Closed

  • `dotnet --info` includes two RID values with .NET 8 #35237

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35375
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35374
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [8.0.1xx] Use MVC extensions from Razor transport #35371
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add escape hatch for PublishAot without RuntimeIdentifier. Fixes #33414. #35366
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Add `.mono` to `.gitingore` #35343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35367
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2266526 #35352
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for Haiku #35231
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35275
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #35315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35368
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35369
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use MVC extensions from Razor transport #35273
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35339
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Add dependency on non shipping package and use it's version #35310
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35325
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #35324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix package version in Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #35309
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Containers] Validate that user applications will run on the selected base image #35246
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Container Build: Add OCI Archive Format writing #35204
    untriaged, Area-Containers
